markdownRemark.html: Finally back in cyberspace after a month a half of no code update in this blog. I was addressing myriads of unfortunate or rather uncontrolled events but was able to traverse it despite the odds. Crazy how life pulls it’s own strings to give you the right problem at the wrong time.. I don’t know if it is still a part of natural selection but have observed that it is sort of related in a way.
